data.text:
Summer Training Camp had started. Mejiro Ramonu was stoically 
carrying out the training without any input from me.
data.processed:
<story>Summer Training Camp had started. Mejiro Ramonu was stoically 
<story>carrying out the training without any input from me.

data.text: ――Haa…… Haa……
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>――Haa…… Haa……

data.text: Huu――!
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>Huu――!

data.text:
She was doing everything perfectly, there were no issues. 
But, not being able to understand what she's thinking had me worried……
data.processed:
<story>She was doing everything perfectly, there were no issues. 
<story>But, not being able to understand what she's thinking had me worried……

data.text:
Thanks for the meal. 
Then, back to training――
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed:
<story>Thanks for the meal. 
<story>Then, back to training――

data.text:
Oh, there you are~. Hey, did you hear? 
Seems like there's going to be a festival tonight.
data.name: Trainer Colleague
data.processed:
<story>Oh, there you are~. Hey, did you hear? 
<story>Seems like there's going to be a festival tonight.

data.text:
Yeah! And, that thing from your hometown…… 
what was it called? You know, that! That tasty 
looking gourmet food is going to be sold――
data.name: Trainer Colleague
data.processed:
<story>Yeah! And, that thing from your hometown…… 
<story>what was it called? You know, that! That tasty 
<story>looking gourmet food is going to be sold――

data.text:
He was all smiles as he talked about the place. To me, 
it wasn't too unusual, but the night festival sounded fun.
data.processed:
<story>He was all smiles as he talked about the place. To me, 
<story>it wasn't too unusual, but the night festival sounded fun.

data.text:
Well, keep it in mind. A bunch of the other trainers 
and their Uma Musume are going too. Things'll go 
much smoother that way, after all. Hahahaa.
data.name: Trainer Colleague
data.processed:
<story>Well, keep it in mind. A bunch of the other trainers 
<story>and their Uma Musume are going too. Things'll go 
<story>much smoother that way, after all. Hahahaa.

data.text: I see.
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>I see.

data.text:
I thought maybe if we went together we could interact 
more, but it seems she's not interested. Well, knowing 
her, she might change her mind later, maybe……?

choices.text: (If she's in a good mood, I'll ask……?)

data.processed:
<story>I thought maybe if we went together we could interact 
<story>more, but it seems she's not interested. Well, knowing 
<story>her, she might change her mind later, maybe……?

data.text:
Or, at least that was what I was thinking, but…… In the evening, 
a butler from the Mejiro family came looking for her.
data.processed:
<story>Or, at least that was what I was thinking, but…… In the evening, 
<story>a butler from the Mejiro family came looking for her.

data.text:
――And so, I was entrusted with this invitation 
by the fans. The party will be held on a modest 
ship nearby, so they would like you to attend……
data.name: Mejiro Family Butler
data.processed:
<story>――And so, I was entrusted with this invitation 
<story>by the fans. The party will be held on a modest 
<story>ship nearby, so they would like you to attend……

data.text: I see.
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>I see.

data.text:
It's being held by that businessman who sends 
gifts almost every month. Apparently they happened 
to be here attempting to escape the heat.
data.name: Mejiro Family Butler
data.processed:
<story>It's being held by that businessman who sends 
<story>gifts almost every month. Apparently they happened 
<story>to be here attempting to escape the heat.

data.text: Who might that be……?
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>Who might that be……?

data.text: Well, it's fine. 『I will attend』, would you mind telling them?
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>Well, it's fine. 『I will attend』, would you mind telling them?

data.text:
The butler bowed and left. I was surprised by how 
sudden it was, but for her, I guess it was normal.
data.processed:
<story>The butler bowed and left. I was surprised by how 
<story>sudden it was, but for her, I guess it was normal.

data.text:
Seems like the night breeze is coming in 
……Notify the school, would you?
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed:
<story>Seems like the night breeze is coming in 
<story>……Notify the school, would you?

data.text: ……Hello?
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>……Hello?

data.text:
Heeeeeey~, finished with training~? 
About the festival, what're you gonna do?
data.name: Trainer Colleague
data.processed:
<story>Heeeeeey~, finished with training~? 
<story>About the festival, what're you gonna do?

data.name: Mejiro Ramonu

choices.text: She has something to attend to

data.processed: <story>…………?

data.text: I didn't ask you to come with me though?
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu

choices.text: I want to go with you
I want to go with you

data.processed: <story>I didn't ask you to come with me though?

data.text: Hmmmmm. ……I see.
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>Hmmmmm. ……I see.

data.text: Okay……! Then, next time when we get a chance~~!
data.name: Trainer Colleague
data.processed: <story>Okay……! Then, next time when we get a chance~~!

data.text:
Then, I followed her to the venue written on 
the invitation. There was a luxurious cruise 
ship moored by the dock in the distance.
data.processed:
<story>Then, I followed her to the venue written on 
<story>the invitation. There was a luxurious cruise 
<story>ship moored by the dock in the distance.

data.text:
In any case, this was probably fine. I wasn't invited so, 
I was thinking of just waiting for her nearby.
data.processed:
<story>In any case, this was probably fine. I wasn't invited so, 
<story>I was thinking of just waiting for her nearby.

data.text:
Aaaah~~! Ramonu-san! I've been waiting for you…… 
Oh, that badge…… are you Ramonu-san's trainer!?
data.name: Ramonu Fan
data.processed:
<story>Aaaah~~! Ramonu-san! I've been waiting for you…… 
<story>Oh, that badge…… are you Ramonu-san's trainer!?

data.text:
I see, since it's training camp I suppose it's normal 
your trainer would be with you……! I apologize 
for forgetting about that. Now, to the ship……!
data.name: Ramonu Fan
data.processed:
<story>I see, since it's training camp I suppose it's normal 
<story>your trainer would be with you……! I apologize 
<story>for forgetting about that. Now, to the ship……!

data.text: So she says……lucky you.
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>So she says……lucky you.

data.text:
On deck, a sparkly scene spread before me. The ship headed 
offshore, leaving the hustle and bustle of land behind.
data.processed:
<story>On deck, a sparkly scene spread before me. The ship headed 
<story>offshore, leaving the hustle and bustle of land behind.

data.text:
I had come as Mejiro Ramonu's chaperone. I'd have to behave 
in a proper manner. On the other hand, she acted as normal.
data.processed:
<story>I had come as Mejiro Ramonu's chaperone. I'd have to behave 
<story>in a proper manner. On the other hand, she acted as normal.

data.text: What a nice sea breeze……
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>What a nice sea breeze……

data.text:
Good evening, Ramonu-san. I'm honored to meet you! 
I always watch your races. Your spring results were wonderful……
data.name: Celeb A
data.processed:
<story>Good evening, Ramonu-san. I'm honored to meet you! 
<story>I always watch your races. Your spring results were wonderful……

data.text: Thank you very much. I see you also like races.
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>Thank you very much. I see you also like races.

data.text:
Oooh, it really is Ramonu-san……! I heard you would be attending 
today, so I thought I just had to come and meet you.
data.name: Celeb B
data.processed:
<story>Oooh, it really is Ramonu-san……! I heard you would be attending 
<story>today, so I thought I just had to come and meet you.

data.text: Oh, I'm honored.
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>Oh, I'm honored.

data.text:
She exchanged words with many people as if it was natural. 
I was so nervous and shy, all I could do was just smile and nod.
data.processed:
<story>She exchanged words with many people as if it was natural. 
<story>I was so nervous and shy, all I could do was just smile and nod.

data.text:
――Ooh, lessons like that too…… ――Oh, that person from the URA……? 
――I'll go see your races in the fall…… ――He's a classmate of mine……
data.name: Multiple Celebs
data.processed:
<story>――Ooh, lessons like that too…… ――Oh, that person from the URA……? 
<story>――I'll go see your races in the fall…… ――He's a classmate of mine……

data.text:
――Right, right! This year I vacationed around there. I was tired 
of traveling abroad so I wanted to see some famous local places too.
data.name: Celeb C
data.processed:
<story>――Right, right! This year I vacationed around there. I was tired 
<story>of traveling abroad so I wanted to see some famous local places too.

data.text: Oh. That's Trainer-san's hometown, isn't it?
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>Oh. That's Trainer-san's hometown, isn't it?

data.text: Am I wrong?
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>Am I wrong?

data.text: Yes, something wrong with that?
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>Yes, something wrong with that?

data.text:
Oooh, so that's your hometown! Well, it's quite a fine place. 
I took a bunch of photos, take a look!
data.name: Celeb C

choices.text: Ah, I've been to that place too……!
Ah, I've been to that place too……!

data.processed:
<story>Oooh, so that's your hometown! Well, it's quite a fine place. 
<story>I took a bunch of photos, take a look!

data.text:
Before I realized it, I was joining in on the lively conversations 
as well. My stress disappeared and I ended up having a great time.
data.processed:
<story>Before I realized it, I was joining in on the lively conversations 
<story>as well. My stress disappeared and I ended up having a great time.

data.text:
――Eventually, the ship returned to shore and 
the party ended. The walk back to training camp 
was quiet, as if I had woken up from a dream……
data.processed:
<story>――Eventually, the ship returned to shore and 
<story>the party ended. The walk back to training camp 
<story>was quiet, as if I had woken up from a dream……

data.text: ……Oh, I just happened to remember it.
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>……Oh, I just happened to remember it.

data.text: Keeping the conversation going is just the basics of socializing……
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>Keeping the conversation going is just the basics of socializing……

data.text:
It's not possible that……you thought I was the type 
of Uma Musume who couldn't handle that much, right?
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed:
<story>It's not possible that……you thought I was the type 
<story>of Uma Musume who couldn't handle that much, right?

data.text: Hmmm……
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>Hmmm……

data.text:
It felt like I was finally reflected in her eyes. 
Even after telling her, her expression remained unchanged.
data.processed:
<story>It felt like I was finally reflected in her eyes. 
<story>Even after telling her, her expression remained unchanged.

data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>…………Heh.

data.text: You sure like to exaggerate
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>You sure like to exaggerate
